TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Publish extends System.Object implements class System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher

summary.span: 發行啟用 SOAP 之 COM+ 應用程式的 COM 介面。

span.span: Publishes COM interfaces for SOAP-enabled COM+ applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是由.NET Framework 內部使用。 is used internally by the .NET Framework. 您不需要直接在您的程式碼中使用它。You do not need to use it directly in your code.

param.name: RootMailServer
param.span: 根郵件伺服器的 URL。

span.span: The URL for the root mail server.

param.name: MailBox
param.span: 要建立的信箱。

span.span: The mailbox to create.

param.name: SmtpName
param.span: 當這個方法傳回時，這個參數會包含內含信箱的 Simple Mail Transfer Protocol (SMTP) 伺服器名稱。

span.span: When this method returns, this parameter contains the name of the Simple Mail Transfer Protocol (SMTP) server containing the mailbox.

param.name: Domain
param.span: 當這個方法傳回時，這個參數會包含 SMTP 伺服器的網域。

span.span: When this method returns, this parameter contains the domain of the SMTP server.

param.name: PhysicalPath
param.span: 當這個方法傳回時，這個參數會包含信箱的檔案系統路徑。

span.span: When this method returns, this parameter contains the file system path for the mailbox.

param.name: Error
param.span: 如果遇到問題，則這個方法傳回時，這個參數會包含錯誤訊息。

span.span: When this method returns, this parameter contains an error message if a problem was encountered.

summary.span: 傳回 SoapCache 目錄中以強式名稱簽名所產生組件的完整路徑。

span.span: Returns the full path for a strong-named signed generated assembly in the SoapCache directory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 讓 unmanaged COM + 元件發行經由.NET 遠端處理，做為 SOAP 端點，proxy 就必須產生可讓.NET Framework 中使用的 unmanaged 的元件。For an unmanaged COM+ component to be published through .NET remoting as a SOAP endpoint, a proxy needs to be generated to make the unmanaged components available to the .NET Framework. 這是藉由以程式設計方式執行相同的步驟，類型程式庫匯入工具 (Tlbimp.exe)，[!INCLUDE[winsdklong](~/includes/winsdklong-md.md)]用來將 unmanaged com 類型程式庫轉換成 proxy 中繼資料組件的工具。This is done by programmatically performing the same steps as Type Library Importer (Tlbimp.exe), the [!INCLUDE[winsdklong](~/includes/winsdklong-md.md)] tool that is used to convert unmanaged COM+ type libraries to proxy metadata assemblies. 不過，對於透過成功的 SOAP 用戶端啟用，用戶端和伺服器電腦必須共用相同的強式名稱簽署中繼資料 proxy。For client activation over SOAP to succeed, however, client and server machines must share the same strong-named signed metadata proxies. 基於這個理由，受管理的 proxy 組件時產生的 unmanaged COM + 元件，強式名稱金鑰也產生並用以簽署 proxy 組件。For this reason, when a managed proxy assembly is generated for an unmanaged COM+ component, a strong name key is also generated and used to sign the proxy assembly.

summary.span: 處理用戶端型別程式庫，並在用戶端建立組態檔。

span.span: Processes a client type library, creating a configuration file on the client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法在用戶端 proxy 匯入用於產生的遠端組態檔。This method is used on a client proxy import to generate a remoting configuration file. 如果`Mode`參數是 「 wellknownobject"或空字串 ("")，會假設為已知物件;否則，會假設用戶端啟動過程。If the `Mode` parameter is either "wellknownobject" or an empty string (""), a well-known object is assumed; otherwise, client activation is assumed. 建議而不是使用。It is recommended that be used instead of .

exception.span: 呼叫鏈結中的呼叫端沒有存取 Unmanaged 程式碼的使用權限。

span.span: A caller in the call chain does not have permission to access unmanaged code.

permission.span: 提供存取 unmanaged 程式碼的能力。

span.span: for the ability to access unmanaged code.
Associated enumeration:

MemberSignature.Value: public void ProcessServerTlb (string ProgId, string SrcTlbPath, string PhysicalPath, string Operation, out string strAssemblyName, out string TypeName, out string Error);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ProcessServerTlb(string ProgId, string SrcTlbPath, string PhysicalPath, string Operation, [out] string& strAssemblyName, [out] string& TypeName, [out] string& Error) cil managed
Public Sub ProcessServerTlb (ProgId As String, SrcTlbPath As String, PhysicalPath As String, Operation As String, ByRef strAssemblyName As String, ByRef TypeName As String, ByRef Error As String)

public: virtual void ProcessServerTlb(System::String ^ ProgId, System::String ^ SrcTlbPath, System::String ^ PhysicalPath, System::String ^ Operation, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::String ^ % strAssemblyName, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::String ^ % TypeName, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::String ^ % Error);
abstract member ProcessServerTlb : string * string * string * string * * * -> unit override this.ProcessServerTlb : string * string * string * string * * * -> unit
MemberSignature.Usage: publish.ProcessServerTlb (ProgId, SrcTlbPath, PhysicalPath, Operation, strAssemblyName, TypeName, Error)

param.name: ProgId
param.span: 類別的程式設計識別項。

span.span: The programmatic identifier of the class.

param.name: SrcTlbPath
param.span: 含有型別程式庫之檔案的路徑。

span.span: The path for the file that contains the type library.

param.name: PhysicalPath
param.span: Web 應用程式目錄。

span.span: The Web application directory.

param.name: Operation
param.span: 要執行的作業。

span.span: The operation to perform.

param.name: strAssemblyName
param.span: 當這個方法傳回時，這個參數會包含組件的顯示名稱。

span.span: When this method returns, this parameter contains the display name of the assembly.

param.name: TypeName
param.span: 當這個方法傳回時，這個參數會包含組件的完整型別名稱。

span.span: When this method returns, this parameter contains the fully-qualified type name of the assembly.

param.name: Error
param.span: 如果遇到問題，則這個方法傳回時，這個參數會包含錯誤訊息。

span.span: When this method returns, this parameter contains an error message if a problem was encountered.

summary.span: 處理伺服器型別程式庫，不是將元件項目加入 Web.config 和 Default.disco 檔案中，就是將之刪除。

span.span: Processes a server type library, either adding or deleting component entries to the Web.config and Default.disco files.

summary.span: 若有必要則產生 Proxy。

span.span: Generates a proxy if necessary.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 探索檔和元件的型別程式庫，在 web.config 檔案中新增項目，並會產生或 proxy 會將複製到 unmanaged 元件的 bin 目錄。 adds an entry to the discovery file and the web.config file for the components in the typelib, and either generates or copies a proxy to the bin directory for unmanaged components. 如果`Operation`等於 「 刪除 」，則元件項目會從 Web.config 和 Default.disco 檔案移除。If `Operation` equals "delete," then the component entries are removed from the Web.config and Default.disco files. 建議並而不是使用。It is recommended that and be used instead of .

exception.span: 呼叫鏈結中的呼叫端沒有存取 Unmanaged 程式碼的使用權限。

span.span: A caller in the call chain does not have permission to access unmanaged code.

exception.span: 參數參考到 scrobj.dll，因此不支援指令碼元件的 SOAP 發行作業。

span.span: The parameter referenced scrobj.dll; therefore, SOAP publication of script components is not supported.

permission.span: 提供存取 unmanaged 程式碼的能力。

span.span: for the ability to access unmanaged code.

summary.span: 註冊 COM Interop 的組件。

span.span: Registers an assembly for COM interop.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用組件註冊工具 (Regasm.exe) 來註冊組件中的可建立的類別。 uses the Assembly Registration tool (Regasm.exe) to register the creatable classes in the assembly. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Regasm.exe （組件登錄工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/regasm-exe-assembly-registration-tool.md)。For more information, see [Regasm.exe (Assembly Registration Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/regasm-exe-assembly-registration-tool.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要取消註冊組件中的可建立類別，會使用 Regasm.exe。 uses Regasm.exe to unregister the creatable classes in the assembly. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Regasm.exe （組件登錄工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/regasm-exe-assembly-registration-tool.md)。For more information, see [Regasm.exe (Assembly Registration Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/regasm-exe-assembly-registration-tool.md).
